chainhash
=========

[![Build Status](http://img.shields.io/travis/valhallacoin/vhcd.svg)](https://travis-ci.org/valhallacoin/vhcd)
[![ISC License](http://img.shields.io/badge/license-ISC-blue.svg)](http://copyfree.org)
[![GoDoc](https://img.shields.io/badge/godoc-reference-blue.svg)](http://godoc.org/github.com/valhallacoin/vhcd/chaincfg/chainhash)

chainhash provides a generic hash type and associated functions that allows the
specific hash algorithm to be abstracted.

## Installation and updating

```bash
$ go get -u github.com/valhallacoin/vhcd/chaincfg/chainhash
```

## License

Package chainhash is licensed under the [copyfree](http://copyfree.org) ISC
License.
